cart.title: SHOPPING CART
cart.ready: Ready to find your new favorite products?
cart.prop65: ⚠ WARNING: The cocoa beans that we use to make our chocolate can expose you to cadmium, which is known to the state of California to cause birth defects or other reproductive harm.
cart.prop65_detail_html: Cadmium is a naturally-occurring component in soil, and many plants take it up as they absorb nutrients, which is how it gets into our cocoa beans. According to the CDC, cadmium is commonly found in vegetables, and in relatively high concentrations in leafy greens like spinach. The law won't allow us to say much more about how the tiny trace amounts found in our product will affect your health, but if you want to reduce your exposure to cadmium generally, you might consider eating fewer leafy greens. Virtually all chocolate needs to have a prop 65 warning, but if you'd like a more nuanced view or want to know more, visit www.P65warnings.ca.gov, send us an email, or give us a call @ (415) 349-0942. We'd be happy to talk.

cart.taxes_and_shipping_at_checkout: Final tax and shipping calculated during checkout
cart.summer_shipping_notice_html:
We ship Monday through Friday, pending product availability.

Choose $15 expedited shipping at checkout for FedEx 2Day service. These orders are processed first and generally ship within one business day. Orders placed before noon ship same business day.

USPS Priority Shipping is free for orders $25 and above. These orders generally ship within 3 business days. We cannot guarantee arrival dates, but work hard to get these orders to USPS as quickly as possible. (Please let us know if USPS delivery is not available to your address.)

From April to September, we pack orders with ice (at no extra charge). For orders placed Wednesday through Friday, if hot weather is forecast, we may hold shipments until Monday, to prevent chocolate from melting over weekends.

cart.summer_gift_shipping_notice_html: We recommend letting recipients know that a meltable gift is on the way to make sure the chocolate is not left in warm weather.
